article_title: Molycorp Creditor Oaktree Scores With Savvy Move
article_text:
Molycorp Inc.’s bankruptcy is poised to leave credit-investing giant Oaktree Capital Group LLC unharmed while rival Apollo Global Management LLC and other junior creditors lick their wounds.

Oaktree beat out Apollo and other investment firms last year to provide up to $400 million in rescue financing to Molycorp, a deal that allowed Oaktree to negotiate for a relatively safe position in a restructuring of the mining company’s debt. In...

article_metadata.author: Matt Jarzemsky
article_metadata.article.origheadline: Molycorp Creditor Oaktree Scores With Savvy Move

article_summary:
Molycorp Inc.’s bankruptcy is poised to leave credit-investing giant Oaktree Capital Group LLC unharmed while rival Apollo Global Management LLC and other junior creditors lick their wounds.
Oaktree beat out Apollo and other investment firms last year to provide up to $400 million in rescue financing to Molycorp, a deal that allowed Oaktree to negotiate for a relatively safe position in a restructuring of the mining company’s debt.
